title: It just feels bad...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Playing the hardest ADC in the game, into a MF and brand "support" lane, there is even a fricken Yasuo on the enemy team (which spells out death to any ADC), have the highest farm and highest gold in the game, over 50% kill participation....
dies once to Yasuo in the last 30 seconds of a wining game.

not even S-

It just genuinely gives you a bad feeling inside, it was a great game i had so much fun, and am going to bed feeling sad...

:(

replies.body: Your score looks good but I think your cs is what brought you down. You should have more than 300 cs at 30 minutes and you should get a S / S+. One thing that also could have been a factor is warding.
Once i was full build (which was fairly early on) i stopped farming and made sure i was with the team.
You should have kept farming dude and it would probably been a S+

Game probably went too long, CS/min matters a lot so once you hit full build it's detrimental to the score you will get at the end to continue (unless you want to keep powerfarming and deny your team gold). If you had of had 430ish cs you probs would of gotten an S. Also pink wards seem to help the score a fair bit (destroying and placing) plus not many ADCs buy them so the system will favor you a bit more if you do.

The system just sucks ass in general tbh the only way I get S or S+ is by playing like a bitch, powerfarming & spamming pinks in places they wont even last long (just placing a pink without your old one dying probs doesn't count it toward your score)

As said by many others on the site, the system compares you and how well you played that champion in that role compared to others in your region.

Very simply, you didn't perform as well as the top players dide on that champion in your role.

I know it compares you to others based on kda, cs, objectives, wards etc. The thing is it weighs cs and warding much more than anything else when taking into consideration the score you will get. I have had games where I just went top with teleport farmed to 300cs in 30 minutes and never participated in helping my team where I have gotten S. I also have had games with a shit score 8+ deaths and not much farm but I've placed a ridiculous amount of pinks and gotten S that way. I have had games where I go 15/0/10 or something and get objectives and win the fights for my team but because my cs is garbo I get an A+.

I mean I can see why they make the system the way it is otherwise people would be all "OMG [REDACTED] YOU STOLE MY KILL" and you would have people all trying to last hit the tower when it falls etc.

But anyways who really cares about grades? It's like extra lollies for kids. I'm only interested in the skill aspect. Just play to win the game and be happy.

If you farm 300cs and don't help your team and lose the game, is it worth getting that S? :)

Or you could just buy more pinks and get that S, if you know that's how it works :)
